FuncDef:
The reset ipv6 nd attack slot command clears the ND statistics from the attacked interface in a specified slot.
The reset ipv6 nd attack interface command clears the ND statistics from the attacked interfaces.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd { na | ns-multicast | ns-unicast } attack interface { <interface-type> <interface-num> | <interface-name> }
reset ipv6 nd { na | ns-multicast | ns-unicast } attack slot { <slotid> | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the slot number of the board.
-

Indicates the ND statistics on the attacked interfaces of all boards.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd na attack slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Running the reset ipv6 nd attack command deletes specified ND statistics. Therefore, exercise caution when running this command.
